Name: The Business
Ingredients: 20 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As the name suggests, The Business is a riff on a classic Bee's Knees with lime juice. It's snappier with lime instead of lemon juice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created by Sasha Petraske at his famous Milk & Honey bar in Manhattan, New York City, USA. The Business features in Georgette Moger-Petraske's 2016 Sasha Petraske Regarding Cocktails .
Nutrition: One serving of The Business contains 184 calories
